title: Boys hostel at rr campus
content: Can someone tell me whether they provide mattress or do we have to buy ourselves and what is their fees for 3 or 2 sharing rooms??

comments.body: Buy urself, fees is 1 lakh 40 this year for all rooms
Bro is it for freshers batch or the existing batch?

Existing batch.
First year for us it was 1 lakh 60 for NB block
And 1lakh 45 for IT block
1 lakh 40 is base this year ( + caution money for 1st year)
Bro that means total may be 1 lakh 70 ðŸ¤¯
